channel.title: Client problem
channel.description:
How to fix??? my client won't open. A cmd opens and closes the next second.
"Exception in thread "main" java.lang.verifyError: <class:Gui, method: actionPer formed-signature <Ljava/awt/event/actionEvent;>V> Incompatible arguement to function"
It's insidiaX client that won't open!
I have also tried to jar the file a couple of times to make it work, but it wouldn't. Not it won't even open :,(

@nervo wrote:

This should be in client help
